description: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?
name: 100 Girls

review.name: A movie against stereotypes that's full of cliches?
review.reviewBody: I don't wanna know what kind of people enjoyed this idiotic crap. "100 Girls" is a typical, stupid college comedy, that's not even funny. Jonathan Tucker's performance is awful and the guy who plays his best friend has a face that is more annoying than work on Sunday. The filmmakers did a good job in including everything I hate: 1) a guy who dresses up as a girl and has to deal with all the boys falling in love with him, 2) beautiful people that are supposed to be ugly, 3) pseudo-thoughtful & pseudo-intellectual speeches and 4) tons of boys/girls-cliches. Yak!
